mkdir /opt/modulefiles/applications/fsa chmod 0755 /opt/modulefiles/applications/fsa ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/application /opt/modulefiles/applications/fsa/1.15.2
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.15.2"
ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/fsa/.version.1.15.2 /opt/modulefiles/applications/fsa/.version
